text: The following is a list of Teen Choice Award winners and nominees for Choice Music – Male Artist. Justin Bieber is the most awarded artist in this category with 6 overall nominations and 5 awards . Aaron Carter is the youngest winner in 2001 at the age of 13. James Blunt is the oldest winner in 2006 at the age of 32. ==Winners and nominees== ===1999=== {|class="wikitable" width=70% !Year !Winner !Nominees !Ref. |- |align="center"|1999 |Ricky Martin | *Ginuwine *Jay Z *R.
